participant_1.background:
I'm a teacher and I'm looking for a way to satisfy my hunger so that I can continue teaching my students.
I now enjoy gardening and cooking with my favorite ingredients.
i work as a personal trainer , 5 days a week.
I like to share my time and company with others.
I don't have any kids, but I'm close to my family.

participant_2.background:
I used to be afraid to speak my mind, but now I am more confident in expressing my opinions.
i sometimes need to scream to feel alive.
i know how to play the guitar.
i have a passion for politics.
I cherish the time I spend with my loved ones.

content.text: It's going well so far! I'm just hanging out and relaxing. How about yours?
It's going well, thanks! I'm just getting ready for work. I'm a teacher and I have a full day of lessons ahead of me.
That sounds exciting! I used to be a teacher, but I'm not anymore. I'm a personal trainer now.
Oh, that's really cool! I love working out, but I'm not very good at it.
It's all about consistency! You just have to keep at it and you'll see results.
I know, I know. I'm trying to get back into a regular workout routine.
That's great! I'm sure you'll be able to do it.
No problem! What kind of music do you like to listen to?
I like all kinds of music, but I especially love classic rock.
Me too! I love classic rock and roll. What are some of your favorite bands?
I love The Beatles, The Rolling Stones, and Led Zeppelin.
Those are all great bands! I love them too.
I also like some newer bands, like The Black Keys and The Strokes.
I love The Black Keys! I've never heard of The Strokes before.
You should check them out! They're a great band.
I will! I'm always looking for new music to listen to.
